settings.heading: Learn the secrets with Molly’s Online Course!

settings.text: The Art of Block Printing with Molly Mahon

settings.subtitle: In this vibrant online course, Molly explores the fundamentals of block printing, revealing her sources of inspiration and creative process so you can be empowered to start your own block printing projects at home.
settings.text:
Printmaker Molly Mahon is fast becoming the ‘go to’
designer for beautifully printed fabrics. In this vibrant
course, Molly explores the fundamentals of block
printing, revealing her sources of inspiration and
creative process so you can be empowered to start your
own block printing projects at home. Watch 19 video
lessons where Molly teaches you step-by-step how to
create designs that can be applied to a range of
homeware including cushions, wallpaper, lampshades,
napkins and tablecloths. Discover how nature and India
have influenced her work and walk through Molly’s
cottage to learn how she applies colour, print and
pattern in her own space.

settings.title: Online video lessons
settings.text: You’ll watch 19 video lessons with Molly, broken down into 8 to 15-minute episodes, as she walks through a number of print projects, step-by-step.

settings.title: Downloadable guide
settings.text: Molly’s favourite techniques and materials are listed in a series of downloadable workbooks, so what you’ve learnt on the course stays with you.

settings.title: Learn at any pace
settings.text: With no fixed start date or time, you’reable to watch Molly’s course at your own pace – on any device you own.
